TopicTitle: F-35 The famous fighter ready to try!

Articles.Content:
I created the KSP version of F-35! Its almost stock. I used a part from damn robotics to be able to rotate the engine back and forward.

Its can take off horizontally and vertically. Its well balanced and easy to control. Its also have 2 rockets, 1 each side.

(To see the images: right click on it and "open image in new tab")

Its available on SpacePort:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/f-35-2/

Have a try and comment what you think
